title: I Live in Chungdamdong
overview: This sitcom tells story of a mother who had lived in a poor area for 60 years and now she's moving to Chungdamdong with hope for a luxurious life there. But, it's only a small two storey house waiting for her. She then opens a comic shop in the first floor and a home-stay in the second floor of her house. The sitcom will entangle the relationship of Hye Ja with her daughter, Ji Eun, the home-stay's guests and the visitor of her comic shop.
